snippet: Mike Miller scored a season-high 26 points on seven 3-pointers, and the injury-depleted Miami Heat beat the host Charlotte Bobcats.
abstract: Miami Heat defeat Charlotte Bobcats, 89-79; other NBA scores and news noted.
lead_paragraph: Mike Miller scored a season-high 26 points on seven 3-pointers, and the injury-depleted Miami Heat beat the host Charlotte Bobcats.

headline.seo: Heat, Minus Stars, Roll Past Bobcats
headline.main: Heat, Minus Stars, Roll Past Bobcats
headline.print_headline: Heat, Minus Stars, Roll Past Bobcats
